OrgName.entry: MONTENEY CHILDRENS CENTRE OUTREACH ADVICE SESSION

Desc.entry: Run by Foxhill and Parson Cross Advice Centre (see separate entry). Session is for parents with children aged under 5 years. Offers advice in the following areas; welfare benefits, debt, housing, maternity rights, disability benefits, consumer issues, represents at county court and disability appeal tribunals.

Address.entry: c/o Foxhill and Parson Cross Advice Service

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Alternate Wed 1-3pm, please contact for details
